abstractModulePack
Class AbstractSignalModule

java.lang.Object
  abstractModulePack.AbstractDeviceModule
      abstractModulePack.AbstractSignalModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
DeviceInterface, SignalInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
RealSignalModule1, RealSignalModule2, TestRackSimulator1, TestRackSimulator2
public abstract class AbstractSignalModule
extends AbstractDeviceModule
implements SignalInterface

This class implements some basic functionalities of a signal generator module. Users can choose to extend this class to include more functionalities.

Author:
tianzhao
